node.detail_zh: 患者居住在北角麗宮大廈，在 2 月 19 日出現咳嗽症狀，在 22 日晚得悉佛堂情況，翌日看私家醫生，再轉介至瑪麗醫院。在 2 月 1 日至 6 日、8 日曾到過佛堂，其他時間主要在家及北角春秧街街市。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Majestic Apartments, North Point. She started coughing on Feb 19. Upon learning about the recent cases relating to the Buddhist preaching hall in North Point on Feb 22 night, she consulted a private doctor the next day and was referred to Queen Mary Hospital. She visited Fook Wai Ching She in Maylun Apartments from Feb 1 to 6 and on Feb 8. She either stayed home or spent time in the Chun Yeung Street Market for the rest of the time.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者
node.group_description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
node.group_description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.location_zh: 書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈福慧精舍
node.location_en: Fook Wai Ching She, Maylun Apartments, 1-25 Shu Kuk Street
